Login.title: Donations
Login.loginSubtitle: Enter your credentials to access your account
Login.noServerResponse: No response from server. Check your internet connection.
Login.unexpectedError: An unexpected error occurred. Please try again.

forgotPassword.title: Forgot your password?
forgotPassword.subtitle: Enter your email address to receive a password reset link
forgotPassword.success: If the email is registered with us, you will receive a password reset link shortly.
forgotPassword.error: Failed to send the password reset link. Please try again.

Register.title: Create a New Account
Register.subtitle: Enter your details to create an account

errors.termsRequired: You must accept the terms and conditions to proceed.
errors.passwordLength: Password must be at least 6 characters.
errors.noServer: No response from server. Please check your internet connection.
errors.unexpected: An unexpected error occurred. Please try again.

ResetPassword.title: Reset Password
ResetPassword.subtitle: Enter your new password

errors.missingToken: Reset password token is missing in the link.
errors.invalidToken: Reset password token is not present.
errors.passwordTooShort: Password must be at least 6 characters.
errors.resetFailed: Failed to reset the password. Please try again.

ResetPassword.success: Password reset successfully. You can now log in.

VerifyDevice.title: Verify New Device
VerifyDevice.instructions: We've detected a login attempt from a new device. Please enter the 6-digit verification code sent to your email.
VerifyDevice.unauthorizedMessage: You are not authorized to view this page. Please return to the homepage.

errors.required: Email and verification code are required.
errors.network: An error occurred. Please try again later.

AboutSection.sectionDescription: We are a charitable organization aiming to improve the lives of those in need through sustainable development and humanitarian aid programs.

transparency.title: Transparency
transparency.description: We ensure your donations reach those in need with full clarity and honesty.

experience.title: Experience
experience.description: Over 15 years of humanitarian and charitable work.

globalImpact.title: Global Impact
globalImpact.description: Operating in more than 25 countries worldwide.

quality.title: Quality
quality.description: Certified with international quality and accreditation standards.

AboutSection.missionParagraph1: We aim to build a more just and compassionate society by supporting those in need and empowering individuals and communities to reach their full potential. We believe everyone deserves the basic opportunities to live with dignity.
AboutSection.missionParagraph2: Through our local and international partnerships, we implement sustainable programs in education, healthcare, economic development, and emergency relief.

HeroSection.title: Together We Build a Better Future
HeroSection.subtitle: Join us on a journey of giving and positive change in the community

DonatePage.description: Help others by donating to their fundraiser, or start one for someone you care about.
